tools.name: Get-ADChanges
tools.description: Detects Active Directory changes using replication metadata and event logs.

SearchBase.description: Optional OU distinguished name to scope the search.

HoursBack.description: Number of hours to look back for changes. Default is 24. Range: 1-720.

ChangeType.description: Filter by object type: All, Users, Groups, Computers, OUs. Default is All.

tools.name: Get-DNSChanges
tools.description: Detects DNS record changes within a specified timeframe.

ZoneName.description:
Optional array of specific zone names to check. If omitted, all
AD-integrated zones are queried.

HoursBack.description: Number of hours to look back for changes. Default is 24. Range: 1-720.

tools.name: Get-GPOChanges
tools.description: Detects Group Policy Object changes within a specified timeframe.

HoursBack.description: Number of hours to look back for changes. Default is 24. Range: 1-720.

IncludeLinkChanges.description: Switch to include GPO link changes on OUs.

tools.name: Get-ServerConfigChanges
tools.description: Detects server configuration changes on remote servers.

ComputerName.description: One or more server hostnames or IP addresses to check. Mandatory.

HoursBack.description: Number of hours to look back for changes. Default is 24. Range: 1-720.

tools.name: Invoke-ChangeAudit
tools.description: Main orchestrator - runs all change detection and generates a consolidated report.

IncludeDNS.description: Switch to include DNS change detection.

BaselinePath.description: Optional path to a previous snapshot JSON file for baseline comparison mode.

IncludeServerConfig.description: Switch to include server configuration change detection.

HoursBack.description: Number of hours to look back for changes. Default is 24. Range: 1-720.

OutputPath.description: Directory path for report output. Default is .\Reports.

ComputerName.description: Server names for server configuration checks (used with -IncludeServerConfig).
